sentences.sentence: A tuberous mexican herb having grasslike leaves and cultivated for its spikes of highly fragrant lilylike waxy white flowers.
sentences.translation: 墨西哥的一种有块茎的草本植物，叶是草质的，花极香、蜡白色、类似小百合花，栽培以供观赏。

sentences.sentence: Any of several plants of the genus brodiaea having basal grasslike leaves and globose flower heads on leafless stems resembling those of genus allium.
sentences.translation: 卜若地属几种植物中的任何一种，具基生草状叶，在类似葱属植物的无叶的茎干上长有球形的头状花序。
